titles.title: Commuter Benefits Equity Act of 2011

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to equalize the exclusion from gross income of parking and transportation fringe benefits and to provide for a common cost-of-living adjustment, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 5/19/2011--Introduced. Commuter Benefits Equity Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to equalize and increase to $230, with a cost-of-living adjustment after 2011, the tax exclusion for both transportation and parking fringe benefits. Extends such benefits to federal employees.
